mapper.update: update t_role set isShow = 'notShow' where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id,name from t_role where isShow = 'show' order by createDate desc
select id,name from t_usergroup where isShow = 'show' order by createDate desc

select t1.id,t1.title,t2.id as functionId,t2.fid,t2.functionName from (select * from t_page where isShow = 'show') t1 left join (select * from t_page_function where isShow = 'show') t2 on t1.id = t2.pageId
